source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Asteraceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Asteraceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Plants perennial, dioecious; leaves with upper surface lacking prickles; stems not winged; florets unisexual; involucres usually less than 25 mm long
Plants annual or biennial; leaves with upper surface covered with many small prickles; stems winged; florets all similar, bisexual; involucres c. 25 mm long
